class RIALocationMetadataView(AsyncAPIView):
    """GET /ria/metadata/location - Get combined location metadata (countries and cities)."""
    permission_classes = [IsAuthenticated]
    
    async def get(self, request: Request):

file_edits.reasoning: Added comprehensive docstring for search_companies method describing its purpose, parameters, and return value

edits.content:
@staticmethod
    def search_companies(
        name: Optional[str] = None,
        domain: Optional[str] = None,
        state: Optional[str] = None,
        city: Optional[str] = None,
        country: Optional[str] = None,
        min_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        max_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        min_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        max_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        min_non_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        max_non_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        min_total_employees: Optional[int] = None,
        max_total_employees: Optional[int] = None,
        min_total_offices: Optional[int] = None,
        max_total_offices: Optional[int] = None,
        # Client type filters (Y/N)
        individual_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        high_net_worth_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        banking_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        investment_companies_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        pension_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        charity_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        state_municipal_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        investment_advisor_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        insurance_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        sovereign_wealth_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        corporate_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        # Private funds filter
        private_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        # Asset class filters (Y/N)
        has_hedge_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_liquidity_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_pe_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_real_estate_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_securitized_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_vc_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_other_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        limit: int = 10,
        offset: int = 0,
    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Search and filter RIA companies with intelligent fuzzy name matching.

        Applies comprehensive filtering on company data including location, AUM ranges,
        employee counts, client types, and fund types. Supports intelligent fuzzy
        name matching with similarity scoring when name parameter is provided.

        Args:
            name: Company name for fuzzy search matching
            domain: Exact domain match filter
            state: Exact state match filter
            city: Exact city match filter
            country: Exact country match filter
            min_aum: Minimum assets under management
            max_aum: Maximum assets under management
            min_discretionary_aum: Minimum discretionary AUM
            max_discretionary_aum: Maximum discretionary AUM
            min_non_discretionary_aum: Minimum non-discretionary AUM
            max_non_discretionary_aum: Maximum non-discretionary AUM
            min_total_employees: Minimum employee count
            max_total_employees: Maximum employee count
            min_total_offices: Minimum office count
            max_total_offices: Maximum office count
            individual_clients: Filter by individual clients (Y/N)
            high_net_worth_clients: Filter by high net worth clients (Y/N)
            banking_clients: Filter by banking clients (Y/N)
            investment_companies_clients: Filter by investment company clients (Y/N)
            pension_clients: Filter by pension clients (Y/N)
            charity_clients: Filter by charity clients (Y/N)
            state_municipal_clients: Filter by state/municipal clients (Y/N)
            investment_advisor_clients: Filter by investment advisor clients (Y/N)
            insurance_clients: Filter by insurance clients (Y/N)
            sovereign_wealth_clients: Filter by sovereign wealth clients (Y/N)
            corporate_clients: Filter by corporate clients (Y/N)
            private_funds: Filter by private funds presence (Y/N)
            has_hedge_funds: Filter by hedge funds presence (Y/N)
            has_liquidity_funds: Filter by liquidity funds presence (Y/N)
            has_pe_funds: Filter by private equity funds presence (Y/N)
            has_real_estate_funds: Filter by real estate funds presence (Y/N)
            has_securitized_funds: Filter by securitized funds presence (Y/N)
            has_vc_funds: Filter by venture capital funds presence (Y/N)
            has_other_funds: Filter by other funds presence (Y/N)
            limit: Maximum number of results to return
            offset: Number of results to skip for pagination

        Returns:
            Dictionary containing total matches, paginated results, pagination metadata,
            and filter status information. Results include match scores for name searches.
        """
        # Load index data
        index_cache = get_index_cache()
        df = index_cache.load()
edits.description: Added comprehensive docstring for search_companies method describing its purpose, parameters, and return value

file_edits.reasoning: Added comprehensive docstring for filter_companies function describing its filtering capabilities and parameters

edits.content:
def filter_companies(
    df: pl.DataFrame,
    domain: Optional[str] = None,
    state: Optional[str] = None,
    city: Optional[str] = None,
    country: Optional[str] = None,
    min_aum: Optional[float] = None,
    max_aum: Optional[float] = None,
    min_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
    max_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
    min_non_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
    max_non_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
    min_total_employees: Optional[int] = None,
    max_total_employees: Optional[int] = None,
    min_total_offices: Optional[int] = None,
    max_total_offices: Optional[int] = None,
    individual_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    high_net_worth_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    banking_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    investment_companies_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    pension_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    charity_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    state_municipal_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    investment_advisor_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    insurance_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    sovereign_wealth_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    corporate_clients: Optional[str] = None,
    private_funds: Optional[str] = None,
    has_hedge_funds: Optional[str] = None,
    has_liquidity_funds: Optional[str] = None,
    has_pe_funds: Optional[str] = None,
    has_real_estate_funds: Optional[str] = None,
    has_securitized_funds: Optional[str] = None,
    has_vc_funds: Optional[str] = None,
    has_other_funds: Optional[str] = None,
) -> pl.DataFrame:
    """Filter RIA companies DataFrame based on multiple criteria.

    Applies comprehensive filtering including location, financial metrics,
    client types, and fund types. Handles both string and numeric column
    types with proper type conversion and null value handling.

    Args:
        df: Input DataFrame containing RIA company data
        domain: Filter by exact domain match
        state: Filter by exact state match
        city: Filter by exact city match
        country: Filter by exact country match
        min_aum: Minimum assets under management threshold
        max_aum: Maximum assets under management threshold
        min_discretionary_aum: Minimum discretionary AUM threshold
        max_discretionary_aum: Maximum discretionary AUM threshold
        min_non_discretionary_aum: Minimum non-discretionary AUM threshold
        max_non_discretionary_aum: Maximum non-discretionary AUM threshold
        min_total_employees: Minimum employee count threshold
        max_total_employees: Maximum employee count threshold
        min_total_offices: Minimum office count threshold
        max_total_offices: Maximum office count threshold
        individual_clients: Filter by individual clients presence (Y/N)
        high_net_worth_clients: Filter by high net worth clients presence (Y/N)
        banking_clients: Filter by banking clients presence (Y/N)
        investment_companies_clients: Filter by investment company clients presence (Y/N)
        pension_clients: Filter by pension clients presence (Y/N)
        charity_clients: Filter by charity clients presence (Y/N)
        state_municipal_clients: Filter by state/municipal clients presence (Y/N)
        investment_advisor_clients: Filter by investment advisor clients presence (Y/N)
        insurance_clients: Filter by insurance clients presence (Y/N)
        sovereign_wealth_clients: Filter by sovereign wealth clients presence (Y/N)
        corporate_clients: Filter by corporate clients presence (Y/N)
        private_funds: Filter by private funds presence (Y/N)
        has_hedge_funds: Filter by hedge funds presence (Y/N)
        has_liquidity_funds: Filter by liquidity funds presence (Y/N)
        has_pe_funds: Filter by private equity funds presence (Y/N)
        has_real_estate_funds: Filter by real estate funds presence (Y/N)
        has_securitized_funds: Filter by securitized funds presence (Y/N)
        has_vc_funds: Filter by venture capital funds presence (Y/N)
        has_other_funds: Filter by other funds presence (Y/N)

    Returns:
        Filtered DataFrame containing only companies matching all specified criteria.
    """
    filtered_df = df
    
    # Location filters (exact match)
edits.description: Added comprehensive docstring for filter_companies function describing its filtering capabilities and parameters
